description1: Supported the development of a new company-wide inventory query tool and dashboard for networking devices
description2: Designed the tool's UI with Figma and assisted the integration of a React frontend with a Django backend and SQL database

description1: Assisted research in computer vision applications for NHL player analysis
description2: Developed a robust object-tracker using OpenCV to track mutiple players simultaniously through game footage and capture image data for annotations

description1: Assisted mechatronics research in machine learning applications for CNC chatter and cutting tool breakage detection
description2: Utilized Python, Numpy, Pandas, and Matplotlib to design and implement systems to collect chatter data for neural network training
